alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 24 at 9:09PM CST until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Texas... Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by Thursday morning at 1000 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pine Island Bayou near Sour Lake. * WHEN...From early Sunday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, water inundates lowland areas near the river. Low spots on Old Sour Lake Road are under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
